author: Jarkko Salojarvi and Samuel Kaski and Janne Sinkkonen
title: Discriminative clustering in Fisher metrics
venue: Neural Networks Research Centre Helsinki University of Technology
window: and secondly through the density function estimate that generates the metric used to define the Fisherian Voronoi regions. IV. EXPERIMENTS Experiments were run with the Wisconsin breast cancer data set from the UCI machine learning repository [9]. The 569 samples consisted of 30 attributes, measured from malignant and benign tumors. We chose the ordinary k-means as the baseline reference method.
